column4: Can anyone assist me? Im in the install from the livecd and when i hit install it goes to 15% "detecting file systems" then kicks me back to the fill in the info page I already filled out.
one drive, 250gb. I partitioned three parts, /boot swap and / in that order
tried telling ubuntu use the whole thing do whatever it wanted that didnt work either
i would first try using the disk utility to wipe your drive, then reboot the live disk and try again
